solution_line_template: Each person gets {total_cookies} cookies / {num_people} people = <<{total_cookies}/{num_people}={cookies_per_person}>>{cookies_per_person} cookies.
Each person gets {total_candy} pieces of candy / {num_people} people = <<{total_candy}/{num_people}={candy_per_person}>>{candy_per_person} pieces of candy.
Each person gets {total_brownies} brownies / {num_people} people = <<{total_brownies}/{num_people}={brownies_per_person}>>{brownies_per_person} brownies.
